entry.title: WIND WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:39 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 02:00 AM PST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 23 %
Dewpoint: -18.4°C
Wind: NNW 21 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over southern sections. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 8:39 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over southern sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming light early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:39 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
